hackathon-eligibility: Anyone with a ticket to Design & Hack is eligible.
hackathon-rules:
All teams must have at least 1 person doing design and 1 person doing development.
All hacks and hackers must abide by our Code of Conduct: http://hackcodeofconduct.org

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How good is your idea? High points are awarded to ideas that are clever, unique, thought-provoking, or just plain interesting.
How well is it designed? High points are awarded to good UX, information architecture, visuals/branding/art-direction, or delightful interactions or animations.
How well did you pull it off? High points are awarded to things that work, things that are technically impressive, or things that built robustly.

hackathon-description-header: Designers and Developers learn from each other, collaborate, and make awesome things!
